Ombi.description: Ombi is a request webui for Plex. It supports Sonarr, Radarr, Sickbeard & friends, along with couchpotato.

/config.description: Choose a Share for Ombi Configuration Files
/config.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Radarr as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run Radarr as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run Radarr as.
